DOC.brief_summary: Losing weight undergo Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( RYGB ) surgery may reduce liver fat content size thereby improve surgical outcome . This study aim investigate whether 2-week 6-week pre-operative liquid formula low-calorie diet ( LCD ) reduce liver fat conventional food diet prior RYGB use magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) . The hypothesis 2-week 6-week liquid formula LCD reduce liver fat conventional food pre-operative diet .
